infos.value: Here I was wondering what the clamor was about...
...and whom should I find but my sworn ally, King Oelde.
There was word of an unidentified troop crossing into Wezette territory, so I dispatched «Equito»...
...But to my surprise, it was you.
King Khury, my father has been gravely injured. There is little time...
And that...soldier of Hourne is in quite a horrid state as well.
You two. Bring them inside and treat their wounds. Now.
It seems Schuzelt's reputation precedes him...
